metadata.title: What level of security/cryptography is offered within the RH850 F1Kx series?

sections.content:
Question:
What level of security/cryptography is offered within the RH850 F1Kx series?
Answer:
RH850 F1Kx → ICU-S Secure Hardware Extension
RH850 F1KM-S1 → ICU-S Secure Hardware Extension
RH850 F1KM-S2 → ICU-M (EVITA MID)
RH850 F1KM-S4 → ICU-M (EVITA MID)
RH850 F1KH-D8 → ICU-MH (EVITA FULL)
  Suitable Products
RH850/F1x
